comment: Not sure what happened in the latest update, but my following tab has completely disappeared. I tried uninstall ING and re-install, which worked for a night. The next day the following tab was gone again. Please fix.
key sentence: The following tab has completely disappeared after the latest update.
the function of activity: This activity involves various tasks such as searching for contacts, playing, pausing, liking, sharing, and reporting videos, as well as managing user profiles and interactions(following list, follower, like,favorites,private,draft).
